name: Moguu's Potato Potato Tug of War
name_original: Moguu's Potato Potato Tug of War
description:
Welcome to the underground world.
My name is Moguu.
I succeded in building my best nest and expanding my territory.
This time, my goal is to eliminate all enemies in the one-on-one duel against the enemies' king.

Reap potatoes by connecting same potatoes.
Pull potato bars up to you.
Be careful that the bars are pulled back by your enemy.
Someone who reaps more will win.

OK, the enemy king came alone.
The final one-on-one fight.
If I win this fight, I can really sleep leisurely～～.

Moguu punch!
Moguu kick!!
Splash, splash...
